title: Silverton Siege
synopsis: After a failed sabotage mission, a trio of anti-apartheid freedom fighters ends up in a tense bank hostage situation. Based on a true story.

title: The Employer and the Employee
synopsis: A young man and his new hire bond over their respective families until an unexpected tragedy sends them all into a dangerous downward spiral.

title: A song for you
synopsis: In Catalonia, a law student with musical aspirations becomes involved in a love triangle with two friends divided by strong political convictions.

title: Hold Tight
synopsis: When a young man goes missing soon after his friend dies, life in a tight-knit, affluent Warsaw suburb slowly unravels, exposing secrets and lies.

title: Heartstopper
synopsis: Teens Charlie and Nick discover their unlikely friendship might be something more as they navigate school and young love in this coming-of-age series.

title: He's Expecting
synopsis: When a successful ad executive who's got it all figured out becomes pregnant, he's forced to confront social inequities he'd never considered before.

title: Yakuza Princess
synopsis: Upon discovering she's the heiress to a prominent Yakuza crime family, a young woman in São Paulo meets a man with amnesia — and a mysterious artifact.

title: Yakamoz S-245
synopsis: After disaster strikes Earth, a marine biologist on a submarine research mission must fight to survive with the crew as a conspiracy comes to light.

title: The Turning Point
synopsis: A slacker who does his best to avoid confrontation strikes up an unlikely friendship with a dangerous thug who suddenly forces his way into his life.

title: Conversations with a Killer: The John Wayne Gacy Tapes
synopsis: He dined with the powerful. He preyed on the vulnerable. Beneath a smiling exterior was the horrifying darkness of a sadistic serial killer.

title: Battle Kitty
synopsis: Kitty and Orc brawl with monsters, beat out rivals — and need your help to move through Battle Island and become champion in this interactive adventure!

title: Cry Babies Magic Tears
synopsis: Little babies with big personalities explore a magical world where their tears of love and happiness give them special powers.

title: Inherit the Viper
synopsis: When a small-town opioid dealer longs to go straight, he must contend with his siblings who want to keep the family business going.

title: Amalgama
synopsis: Three men and a woman, all dentists with problematic personal lives, attend a conference in the Mexican Riviera and spend a memorable two days together.

title: Man of God
synopsis: Samuel forsakes his harsh religious upbringing to live his own life — but his soul remains caught between the world and the faith he left behind.

title: The Taming of the Shrewd
synopsis: When a heartbroken scientist moves back home to start over, her scheming brother hires a handsome stranger to convince her to sell their land.

title: Strawberry Shortcake: Berry in the Big City
synopsis: Aspiring baker Strawberry Shortcake arrives in Big Apple City to get her big break — and have flan-tastic adventures with her new berry besties!

title: Smother-in-Law
synopsis: Living with her family since the pandemic struck, the meddling Isadir does her best to disrupt the lives of her bumbling son and rival daughter-in-law.

title: Our Great National Parks
synopsis: Narrated by former President Barack Obama, this stunning docuseries shines the spotlight on some of the planet's most spectacular national parks.

title: Choose or Die
synopsis: Tempted by a chance to win unclaimed prize money, two friends reboot a mysterious 1980s video game and step into a surreal world of next-level terror.

title: Anatomy of a Scandal
synopsis: Sophie's privileged life as the wife of powerful politician James unravels when scandalous secrets surface — and he stands accused of a shocking crime.

title: The Creature Cases
synopsis: Special agents Sam and Kit hop the globe with their sleuthing skills, science facts and cool gadgets to solve the animal kingdom's many mysteries.

title: Yaksha: Ruthless Operations
synopsis: On assignment in a perilous city to inspect a Black Ops team and its notorious leader, an upstanding prosecutor steps into a deadly war between spies.

title: Metal Lords
synopsis: For teenage misfits Hunter and Kevin, the path to glory is clear: Devote themselves to metal. Win Battle of the Bands. And be worshipped like gods.

title: The In Between
synopsis: After losing the love of her life in a tragic accident, a brokenhearted teen begins to believe that he's sending her signs from beyond the grave.

title: Dancing on Glass
synopsis: When immense pressure threatens a ballerina in a new lead role, she and another dancer escape into a friendship that isolates them from the real world.

title: Dirty Lines
synopsis: In 1980s Amsterdam, an enterprising college student stumbles into a new career at a phone sex line started by two wildly different brothers.

title: Return to Space
synopsis: Elon Musk and SpaceX engineers embark on a historic mission to return NASA astronauts to the International Space Station and revolutionize space travel.

title: The Ultimatum: Marry or Move On
synopsis: Get hitched or call it quits? Couples put their love to the test — while shacking up with other potential matches — in a provocative reality series.

title: Jimmy Savile: A British Horror Story
synopsis: TV star Jimmy Savile charmed a nation with his eccentricity and philanthropy. But sexual abuse allegations expose a shocking unseen side of his persona.

title: The Power of Silence
synopsis: Living in exile during World War II, a master musician uses his art to condemn the war and the violent dictatorship ruling his country.

title: Tomorrow
synopsis: Made half-human and half-spirit by accident, a young man is employed by a company of grim reapers in the underworld to carry out special missions.

title: Furioza
synopsis: A policewoman makes her ex-boyfriend an offer he can't refuse: Either he infiltrates and informs on a gang of hooligans, or his brother goes to jail.

title: Ya veremos
synopsis: Before undergoing high-risk eye surgery, 11-year-old Santi creates a wish list and asks to fulfill it with his divorced — and bickering — parents.

title: The Last Bus
synopsis: After embarking on a life-changing field trip, a group of whip-smart students fight to save humanity from an army of ruthless drones.

title: Captain Nova
synopsis: A fighter pilot from a desolate future unexpectedly transforms into her younger self while traveling back in time on a mission to avert global disaster.

title: The Bubble
synopsis: Sneaking out. Hooking up. Melting down. The cast and crew of a blockbuster action franchise attempt to shoot a sequel while quarantining at a posh hotel.

title: Battle: Freestyle
synopsis: Amalie is elated when her and Mikael's dance crew is selected to compete in Paris, but becomes distracted when she reunites with her estranged mother.

title: Pedro el escamoso
synopsis: An uneducated but charming man who can talk his way into and out of anything falls in love at first sight with a pretty exec, and becomes her chauffeur.

title: Wild Abandon
synopsis: In the haze of a midlife crisis, an architect begins living a double life as a punk while members of his family lead their own crisis-ridden lives.

title: Trust No One: The Hunt for the Crypto King
synopsis: When the young founder of a collapsing cryptocurrency exchange dies unexpectedly, irate investors suspect there's more to his death than meets the eye.

title: All Hail
synopsis: After failing to predict a destructive hailstorm, a famous meteorologist flees to his hometown and soon finds himself on a journey of self-discovery.

title: Thermae Romae Novae
synopsis: A proud bath architect in ancient Rome starts randomly surfacing in present-day Japan, where he's inspired by the many bathing innovations he finds.

title: Transformers: BotBots
synopsis: When the lights go out at the mall, the BotBots come out to play! Meet a fun-loving crew of everyday objects that morph into robots at closing time.

title: Love Like the Falling Petals
synopsis: An aspiring young photographer falls in love with a vibrant hairstylist. The future stretches before them — until a twist of fate changes everything.

title: 800 Meters
synopsis: In 2017, Spain suffered two terrorist attacks perpetrated by young members of its community. How could this happen? This incisive series investigates.

title: In Good Hands
synopsis: Diagnosed with a terminal illness, a single mother encounters a suave bachelor as she grapples with the future of her headstrong six-year-old.

title: Windfall
synopsis: A man breaks into a tech billionaire's empty vacation home, but things go sideways when the arrogant mogul and his wife arrive for a last-minute getaway.

title: Standing Up
synopsis: From juggling jobs to chasing viral fame: Making it in stand-up can be a messy business. But these four friends will risk it all to make the world laugh.

title: Human Resources
synopsis: Lovebugs, Hormone Monsters and a parade of other creatures juggle romance, workplace drama and their human clients' needs in this "Big Mouth" spinoff.

title: Cracow Monsters
synopsis: A young woman haunted by her past joins a mysterious professor and his group of gifted students who investigate paranormal activity — and fight demons.

title: Black Crab
synopsis: To end an apocalyptic war and save her daughter, a reluctant soldier embarks on a desperate mission to cross a frozen sea carrying a top-secret cargo.

title: Soil
synopsis: To revamp the family business, a young entrepreneur sets up a bold yet risky plan of importing soil from Morocco to bury his community’s deceased.

title: Rescued by Ruby
synopsis: Chasing his dream to join an elite K-9 unit, a state trooper partners with a fellow underdog: clever but naughty shelter pup Ruby. Based on a true story.

title: Today We Fix the World
synopsis: After workaholic Diego learns that he might not be the father of young Benito, the duo sets out on an emotional quest to find the boy's biological dad.

title: Solas
synopsis: As her husband recuperates, a woman stays with her daughter, Maria, who left home years ago because of the way her father treated her mother.

title: The Method
synopsis: An unusual interview process for an executive job pits candidates against each other in a psychological battle in which no weapon is too manipulative.

title: The Adam Project
synopsis: After accidentally crash-landing in 2022, time-traveling fighter pilot Adam Reed teams up with his 12-year-old self on a mission to save the future.

title: Taboo
synopsis: Long thought to be dead, an adventurer returns to London to avenge his father's death — and finds himself up against the powerful East India Company.

title: Love, Life & Everything in Between
synopsis: This pan-Arab anthology series tinged with dark humor explores love at large — and relationships up close.

title: Kotaro Lives Alone
synopsis: A lonely little boy moves into a ramshackle apartment building all on his own and makes friends with the broke manga artist who lives next door.

title: Byron Baes
synopsis: Australian influencers flock to Byron Bay for its warm, beachy beauty and cool, creative vibe. Follow these friends as they negotiate life and love.

title: The Bombardment
synopsis: The fates of several Copenhagen residents collide when a WWII bombing mission accidentally targets a school full of children. Based on true events.

title: Autumn Girl
synopsis: In 1960s Poland, performer Kalina Jędrusik is at the height of her popularity but must contend with a spurned official threatening to ruin her career.

title: Lies and Deceit
synopsis: A literature teacher seeks justice against a surgeon she claims date raped her, while he vehemently denies her accounts of the encounter.

title: PIECES OF HER
synopsis: A woman pieces together her mother's dark past after a violent attack in their small town brings hidden threats and deadly secrets to light.

title: Meskina
synopsis: Heartbroken, jobless and in her 30s, Leyla sets out to reinvent herself and search for happiness amid her family's attempts to recouple her.

title: Making Fun
synopsis: Grumpy expert maker Jimmy DiResta fields kids' ideas for delightfully pointless inventions. Then — if he's in the mood — he and his pals build 'em.

title: The Invisible Thread
synopsis: A teenage son of two fathers makes a documentary about his parents but is surprised when a real-life plot twist occurs in his family.

title: The Weekend Away
synopsis: When her best friend vanishes during a girls trip to Croatia, Beth races to figure out what happened. But each clue yields another unsettling deception.

title: Midnight at the Pera Palace
synopsis: At a historic Istanbul hotel, a journalist is thrust into the past and must stop a plot that could change the fate of modern Turkey.

title: The Pirates: The Last Royal Treasure
synopsis: A gutsy crew of Joseon pirates and bandits battle stormy waters, puzzling clues and militant rivals in search of royal gold lost at sea.

title: Against The Ice
synopsis: Exploring Greenland's vast landscape for a lost map, two men must fight to survive. Based on the true story of Denmark's 1909 polar expedition.

title: Worst Roommate Ever
synopsis: Violent con artists. Stone-cold killers. These terrifying true stories unveil some of the worst cohabitation experiences one could ever imagine.

title: The Guardians of Justice
synopsis: When their seemingly fearless leader self-destructs, a team of troubled superheroes must confront festering evil in the world — and in themselves.

title: My Wonderful Life
synopsis: An unhappily married woman fights to keep her multigenerational family together as she tries to stop an anonymous blackmailer from exposing her secret.

title: Memories of My Melancholy Whores
synopsis: In this film based on the Gabriel García Márquez novella, a 90-year-old journalist gifts to himself a night with a teen virgin but falls in love instead.

title: Valentina's Wedding
synopsis: Valentina's seemingly idyllic life in the US is interrupted when planning a wedding means introducing her fiancé to her scandalous family in Mexico.

title: Everything's Gone Wrong!
synopsis: When a young diplomat manages to get the Austrian government to return the Plume of Moctezuma to Mexico for an exhibition, his life quickly falls apart.

title: Vikings: Valhalla
synopsis: In this sequel to "Vikings," a hundred years have passed and a new generation of legendary heroes arises to forge its own destiny — and make history.

title: Restless
synopsis: After going to extremes to cover up an accident, a corrupt cop's life spirals out of control when he starts receiving threats from a mysterious witness.

title: A Madea Homecoming
synopsis: Madea's back — hallelujer! And she's not putting up with any nonsense as family drama erupts at her great-grandson's college graduation celebration.

title: Juvenile Justice
synopsis: A tough judge balances her aversion to minor offenders with firm beliefs on justice and punishment as she tackles complex cases inside a juvenile court.

title: The Fame Game
synopsis: When India’s most famous actress goes missing, the search for her chips away at the flawless facade of her life and family, revealing painful truths.

title: Back to 15
synopsis: Unhappy with her life, 30-year-old Anita accidentally discovers a way to travel back to age 15. Can she rewrite her own history?

title: Karma's World Music Videos
synopsis: Step into Karma's musical world as she rocks the mic — and her curls — for this fun and funky playlist packed with rhymes and the power of positivity!

title: UFO
synopsis: When aspiring musician and student Deniz falls for a rough-hewn motorbike racer, tragedy and family opposition obstruct their path to love.

title: Race: Bubba Wallace
synopsis: This docuseries follows Bubba Wallace, the only Black driver currently in NASCAR's Cup Series, as he uses his voice and talent to change the sport.

title: Cat Burglar
synopsis: In this edgy, over-the-top, interactive trivia toon, answer correctly to help Rowdy the Cat evade Peanut the Security Pup to steal some prized paintings.

title: Don't Kill Me
synopsis: After Mirta dies of a drug overdose with her lover, she resuscitates alone and discovers she's part of a violent world she never knew existed.

title: Thoroughbred
synopsis: Five thieves get away with $30 million that is too hot to handle and agree to let the money cool for five years. Then one makes a terrible mistake.

title: Compadres
synopsis: After his girlfriend is kidnapped by a vengeful villain whose big score was ruined, a Mexican lawman teams up with an orphaned American teen hacker.

title: 3 idiotas
synopsis: Five years after graduating from engineering school, three wild pals learn that a friend who vanished on graduation eve is alive. But what's he up to?

title: Parallel Mothers
synopsis: Two single mothers bond when they meet in a hospital room and give birth the same day. Their subsequent connection transforms both of their lives.

title: One of Us Is Lying
synopsis: Detention brings together five disparate high schoolers, but a killing — and secrets — keep them together as a cat-and-mouse murder mystery unfolds.

title: Texas Chainsaw Massacre
synopsis: In this sequel, influencers looking to breathe new life into a Texas ghost town encounter Leatherface, an infamous killer who wears a mask of human skin.

title: Downfall: The Case Against Boeing
synopsis: Investigators reveal how Boeing’s alleged priority of profit over safety could have contributed to two catastrophic crashes within months of each other.

title: The Cuphead Show!
synopsis: Follow the misadventures of the impulsive Cuphead and his easily swayed brother Mugman in this animated series based on the hit video game.

title: Heart Shot
synopsis: In this short film, teenagers Nikki and Sam are in love and planning their future together — until Nikki's dangerous past returns to threaten everything.

title: Forgive Us Our Trespasses
synopsis: Targeted by Nazis as they hunt down and murder people with disabilities, a boy with a limb difference makes a daring decision while running for his life.
